product_name: Salomon Topaz Ski Poles - Women's - 2012 Closeout
long_description: The Salomon Topaz downhill ski poles for women offer reliable performance at a great value thanks to their sturdy and light aluminum construction. Adjustable loop wrist straps are easy to enter and exit and comfortable to wear. Standard baskets work best in packed snow. Closeout.
short_description: The Salomon Topaz downhill ski poles for women offer reliable performance at a great value thanks to their sturdy and light aluminum construction.
